job.title: Solution Architect
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Our client is seeking a corporate Solution Architect to serve as the technical lead for carrying out solutioning activities in support of their business development.  The ideal candidate will be responsible for researching, identifying, and tailoring technical capabilities that will be integrated into proposals and pre-sales presentations.The Solution Architect will be responsible for coordinating with business development, IT leadership, and proposal leadership to identify technical resources required to support pre-proposal and proposal activities to include developing and/or contributing to basis of estimates, technical and staffing solutions, win themes, technical proposal writing, workflows, and graphics ideas.
